last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Christmas holiday plans are knocked off course when a person is hit by a train near Doncaster, and Christmas Eve heralds the start of an ambitious programme of engineering works.

name: Inside King's Cross: The Railway
overview: Documentary going behind the scenes at the London transport hub, meeting the army of workers who keep this vital network running.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A train loses power, causing delays all over the country.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The London Fire Brigade are called when a passenger falls between the platform and a departing train. Aria the hawk is put to work frightening away scavenging pigeons.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Michael responds to a report of a suspicious bag, Mel's quick thinking reunites a split-up family in Leeds, and driver Lee gets his hands on one of Virgin's new Azuma trains that will come into service in 2018.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Christmas holiday plans are knocked off course when a person is hit by a train near Doncaster, and Christmas Eve heralds the start of an ambitious programme of engineering works.
